sense.def:
Kadar ena stvar
includes another
, ima drugo stvar za enega svojih delov.

seg.quote: The four-man crew included one Briton.
The proposals included the nationalization of major industries.

sense.def:
To include one thing in another
pomeni eno stvar narediti za del druge.

seg.quote: Carpets and curtains are to be included in the purchase price.
